          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'accumulation des couches de sédiment</string>
            <string language="en">The build up of sediment layers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufbau der Sedimentschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração acima de camadas do sedimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione degli strati del sedimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συγκέντρωση των στρωμάτων ιζημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La acumulación de las capas del sedimento</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre l'accumulation des  couches de sédiment sur un grand nombre d'années au fond de la mer.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the build up of layers of sediment over many years at the bottom of the sea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">boue</string>
            <string language="en">mud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fleuves</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Aufbau von Schichten 
Sediment über vielen Jahren an der Unterseite des Meeres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a configuração acima 
das camadas de sedimento sobre muitos anos no fundo do mar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'accumulazione degli
strati di sedimento in molti anni alla parte inferiore del mare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη συγκέντρωση των 
στρωμάτων του ιζήματος κατά τη διάρκεια πολλών ετών στο 
κατώτατο σημείο της θάλασσας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la acumulación de 
capas de sedimento sobre muchos años en el fondo del mar.</string>
          </description>
